predicate.note: Frames file for 'regenerate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: make anew

example.name: hustings?
example.text: ``What I'd like to see, if he is up to it, is for Reagan to take to the hustings *trace* to regenerate enthusiasm for SDI,'' the congressman says.

roleset.note: Might take additional args (start state, eg) but the corpus isn't forthcoming with examples.
